title: American dies in ice cave collapse during Iceland glacier tour
content: One American died and a second was injured after an ice cave popular with tourist groups collapsed Sunday afternoon.
summary: One American died and a second was injured after an ice cave popular with tourist groups collapsed Sunday afternoon.

title: Arrest of Telegram’s Durov inflames debate over online crime and free speech
content: The arrest in France of the site’s Russia-born founder highlights ongoing disputes over social media’s responsibility for spreading child sexual abuse material and other criminal content.
summary: The arrest in France of the site’s Russia-born founder highlights ongoing disputes over social media’s responsibility for spreading child sexual abuse material and other criminal content.

title: Dam collapse in Sudan floods villages; local media reports dozens missing
content: At least four people died after the Arbaat dam’s collapse, according to Sudan’s Health Ministry. Local media, citing government officials, said the toll is probably higher.
summary: At least four people died after the Arbaat dam’s collapse, according to Sudan’s Health Ministry. Local media, citing government officials, said the toll is probably higher.

title: Who is Pavel Durov, the Russian-born Telegram founder arrested in France?
content: Durov, who founded Telegram with his brother, has an estimated net worth of $15 billion. He was born in the Soviet Union and now lives in Dubai.
summary: Durov, who founded Telegram with his brother, has an estimated net worth of $15 billion. He was born in the Soviet Union and now lives in Dubai.

title: Russia strikes energy infrastructure across Ukraine, forcing power outages
content: The attack focused on the power sector comes just days after Ukraine celebrated its independence from the Soviet Union.
summary: The attack focused on the power sector comes just days after Ukraine celebrated its independence from the Soviet Union.

title: How Israel and Hezbollah stepped back from the brink of all-out war
content: Analysts and officials said the potentially disastrous exchange of fire along the Israel-Lebanon border Sunday had become a face-saving moment for both sides.
summary: Analysts and officials said the potentially disastrous exchange of fire along the Israel-Lebanon border Sunday had become a face-saving moment for both sides.

title: She was beaten and bullied for being trans. This pageant gave her pride.
content: In the Pacific nation of Tonga, the growth of Christian evangelical churches is hardening attitudes toward leitis: people born as men who live “like a lady.”
summary: In the Pacific nation of Tonga, the growth of Christian evangelical churches is hardening attitudes toward leitis: people born as men who live “like a lady.”

title: Scores of detainees in Maduro’s post-election roundup are children
content: Maduro’s forces have arrested children as young as 13, rights advocates say. More than 100 remain in custody weeks after Venezuelans began protesting his suspect victory claim.
summary: Maduro’s forces have arrested children as young as 13, rights advocates say. More than 100 remain in custody weeks after Venezuelans began protesting his suspect victory claim.

title: A glimpse of the new ‘Great Game’ between the U.S. and China
content: The competition between the United States and China has seen geopolitical and economic flash points sprawl across continents.
summary: The competition between the United States and China has seen geopolitical and economic flash points sprawl across continents.

title: Reuters safety adviser killed, journalists injured in hotel strike in Ukraine
content: Ryan Evans, a former British soldier providing security services to Reuters journalists, was killed when a hotel in Ukraine was hit by a missile.
summary: Ryan Evans, a former British soldier providing security services to Reuters journalists, was killed when a hotel in Ukraine was hit by a missile.

title: Telegram founder Pavel Durov detained in France
content: Pavel Durov’s online messaging app Telegram has come under increasing scrutiny from governments concerned about its unmoderated messaging services.
summary: Pavel Durov’s online messaging app Telegram has come under increasing scrutiny from governments concerned about its unmoderated messaging services.

title: German feds take over festival stabbing case, citing suspected terrorism
content: A 26-year-old Syrian man turned himself in after a deadly attack at a festival. Officials are investigating him on suspicion of being an Islamic State member.
summary: A 26-year-old Syrian man turned himself in after a deadly attack at a festival. Officials are investigating him on suspicion of being an Islamic State member.

title: Israel, Hezbollah exchange heaviest strikes in months, raising regional tension
content: The dramatic but contained escalation overnight Sunday stopped short of all-out war, with Hezbollah and Israel both signaling restraint.
summary: The dramatic but contained escalation overnight Sunday stopped short of all-out war, with Hezbollah and Israel both signaling restraint.

title: Hezbollah ends operation after successful drone and rocket strike, leader says
Hezbollah’s escalated attack ‘is over’ after trading airstrikes with Israel, leader says
content: Israel said it preemptively struck Hezbollah targets to foil an attack from the group. The escalation in Israel and Lebanon comes ahead of Gaza cease-fire talks in Cairo.
summary: Israel said it preemptively struck Hezbollah targets to foil an attack from the group. The escalation in Israel and Lebanon comes ahead of Gaza cease-fire talks in Cairo.

title: Ilya Yashin, the activist who didn’t want to leave Russian prison
content: Ilya Yashin wanted to resist Putin’s regime from inside the country, but after the prisoner swap, he must learn to be part of Russia’s opposition in exile.
